STATE v. HAYES No. COA04-1550 North Carolina Court of Appeals Filed July 19, 2005 Certification Date August 8, 2005 Appeal from Yadkin (03CRS51098, 03CRS51101, 03CRS51104, 04CRS145, 03CRS51274, 03CRS51275, 03CRS51278, 03CRS51280).

Case without published opinion. Motion denied; judgment affirmed.
